ARABIC: قَالَ أَفَتَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُكُمْ شَيْـًٔا وَلَا يَضُرُّكُمْ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Do you then worship, instead of Allah, what cannot help or harm you in any way?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (So Abraham) said: "Then why do you worship something apart from God that cannot profit you or do you harm?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Abraham said: "Do you, then, worship beside Allah a thing that can neither benefit you nor hurt you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He said, "Do you, instead of God, worship things that can neither harm nor benefit you?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “What! You worship, instead of Allah, one that neither benefits you nor harms you?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "Do you then worship besides Allah, things that can neither profit you nor harm you"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: What! do you then serve besides Allah what brings you not any benefit at all, nor does it harm you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'What, and do you serve, apart from God, that which profits you nothing; neither hurts you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Worship ye then instead of Allah that which cannot profit you at all, nor harm you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Abraham said, "So, do you worship something instead of God that can neither benefit you nor harm you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: worship ye, then, beside Allah, that which profiteth you not at all, nor it hurteth you
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Then, do you worship besides Allah that which cannot cause you any benefit or harm?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Abraham) said, "Do ye then worship, besides Allah, things that can neither be of any good to you nor do you harm?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: [Ibrahim (Abraham)] said: "Do you then worship besides Allah, things that can neither profit you, nor harm you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He said: 'Would you then worship that, instead of Allah, which can neither help nor harm you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “Do you worship, instead of God, what can neither benefit you in anything, nor harm you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "Then do you worship instead of Allah that which does not benefit you at all or harm you?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:66] He said, ‘Do you then worship, besides God, that is, in His place, that which cannot benefit you in any way, with regard to [granting you] provision and otherwise, nor harm you?, in any way if you were not to worship it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Abraham said: (Worship ye then instead of Allah that which cannot profit you at all) if you worshipped it, (nor harm you) if you did not worship it?
